short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to have more stats on your pangolin farming! Source code : https://github.com/AurelienFT/PangolinStats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The goal of this extension is to provide data on pool on the Pangolin Exchange. You can have more details about the PNG/week you are farming etc... This extension just append data to the UI and do not fetch your informations. We all hope that it will be implemented in the UI natively soon.
